name: BlockPuzzle
description:
Blockpuzzle is a game that completes the stage by filling scattered blocks in the center grid.
Enjoy the best game of the game, the people around the world, and the Block puzzle for free.

FEATURES
● 7 levels and 14 packs in total.
● Try to solve block puzzles that are becoming increasingly difficult from 5 color blocks to 11 color blocks.
● Supports leaderboards and challenges.
● Time attack mode is supported.
● Leveling is supported.
● Supports all 4 cool backgrounds. Please use it according to personality.

Gaming inquiries We will answer please leave a Facebook page.

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ordinarycell/
